models.Tool: An educational capability that agents can invoke for teaching and learning tasks.
models.ToolParameter: A parameter that an educational tool accepts.
models.ToolPackage: An npm package that provides educational tools.
models.EnvironmentVariable: Workspace configuration for educational APIs and services.
models.UsageReference: Where a tool is used in the prompt library.

relationships: EnvironmentVariable is used by one or more Tools

tools.name: Standards Alignment Checker
tools.description: Validates lesson plans and assessments against curriculum standards including Common Core, NGSS, TEKS, and state-specific frameworks.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Lesson plan or assessment content to validate

tools.documentation: Validates educational content against specified curriculum standards. Returns alignment status, matched standards, and suggestions for improving alignment. Supports all major US state standards and international frameworks.

tools.name: Resource Library Search
tools.description: Searches educational resource libraries including OER Commons, Khan Academy, and teacher-created repositories for lesson materials.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Type: worksheet, video, lesson plan, activity, assessment

tools.documentation: Searches multiple educational resource repositories simultaneously. Returns relevant resources with descriptions, download links, and usage metadata. Filters by grade level, subject, and resource type.

tools.name: Assessment Generator
tools.description: Creates quizzes, tests, exit tickets, and performance tasks based on learning objectives and standards.

parameters.name: learningObjectives
parameters.description: Array of learning objectives to assess

parameters.name: assessmentType
parameters.description: Type: quiz, test, exitTicket, project, performanceTask

tools.documentation: Generates assessment items aligned to learning objectives using item templates and AI. Supports multiple question formats including multiple choice, constructed response, and performance tasks. Includes answer keys and scoring guides.

tools.name: Rubric Generator
tools.description: Creates customizable rubrics for performance-based assessments, projects, and presentations.
tools.documentation: Creates clear, task-specific rubrics with descriptive performance indicators. Supports holistic and analytic rubric types. Includes student-friendly language versions.

tools.name: Question Bank
tools.description: Access to thousands of standards-aligned assessment questions across subjects and grade levels.

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description: Multiple choice, constructed response, or technology-enhanced

parameters.name: difficulty
parameters.description: Easy, medium, or hard difficulty level

tools.documentation: Retrieves standards-aligned assessment items from a vetted question bank. All items are field-tested for validity and reliability. Includes distractor analysis for multiple choice items.

tools.name: Accommodation Suggester
tools.description: Suggests IEP/504 accommodations and modifications for assessments and activities based on student needs.

parameters.name: activityType
parameters.description: Type of activity: assessment, group work, presentation, etc.

tools.documentation: Provides specific accommodation suggestions based on disability categories and activity types. Includes accommodations for reading, writing, math, attention, behavior, and English learners. Cites relevant legal requirements (IDEA, Section 504).

tools.name: Activity Database
tools.description: Database of team-building, icebreaker, and collaborative learning activities organized by grade level and skill focus.

parameters.name: skillFocus
parameters.description: Target skills: communication, trust, problem-solving, etc.

tools.documentation: Returns detailed activity instructions including setup, rules, debrief questions, and variations. All activities are vetted for classroom appropriateness and include safety considerations.

tools.name: Grouping Strategy Advisor
tools.description: Suggests optimal student grouping strategies based on class profile and learning objectives.

parameters.name: classProfile
parameters.description: Class characteristics including size, needs, dynamics

tools.documentation: Recommends grouping strategies such as random, ability-based, heterogeneous, interest-based, or strategic pairing. Includes considerations for students with specific needs and classroom dynamics.

tools.name: Reflection Prompt Generator
tools.description: Creates reflection prompts for team-building, SEL activities, and learning consolidation.

parameters.name: activityContext
parameters.description: Description of the activity to reflect on

tools.documentation: Generates age-appropriate reflection prompts that help students process their learning and social experiences. Prompts support metacognition and social-emotional development.

tools.name: Differentiation Helper
tools.description: Suggests differentiation strategies for lessons based on student needs and learning profile.
tools.documentation: Provides specific differentiation strategies based on Tomlinson's model: content (what students learn), process (how they make sense of ideas), product (how they demonstrate learning), and environment (physical and social setting).

tools.name: Parent Communication Assistant
tools.description: Drafts professional emails, newsletters, and updates for families in multiple languages.

parameters.name: messageType
parameters.description: Type: email, newsletter, progress report, concern

tools.documentation: Generates professional communications to families. Includes templates for common scenarios and supports translation to home languages. Maintains appropriate tone and confidentiality.

tools.name: IEP Goal Writer
tools.description: Helps write SMART IEP goals aligned to standards with measurable benchmarks.

parameters.name: areaOfNeed
parameters.description: Area of need: reading, math, behavior, communication, etc.

tools.documentation: Creates SMART (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound) IEP goals aligned to grade-level standards. Includes short-term objectives and progress monitoring suggestions.
